overview: Liaozhai Meihu Zhuan tells the story of six young girls who were killed when Huge, a young man in Wanfeng Town, went up to the mountain to collect medicine. When they saw their serious injuries, they took them home for Chinese medicine treatment. That night, the six girls showed their original shape, but they were fox demons. They were determined to drive away the fox demons by sticking to the Huge song of “people and Demons can’t be in company with each other”.
title: Legend Of The Fox
